about.title: Let me tell you something about me
about.aboutInfo: I am Mauro Daniel Machado, i have 25 years old and I am an advanced student of the Computer Engineering career at the National University of Catamarca. I like to program, both on the back-end and on the front-end. My dream is be a Software Architect.
